description: Schema for validating student registrations for NAPLAN SRM
title: NAPLAN validation schema

___JurisdictionId.name: JurisdictionId
___JurisdictionId.description: Student Id assigned by jurisdiction, such as a state-level ID.

___TAAId.name: TAAId
